name: resorcinol diglycidyl ether
Restrictions: Not to be used for articles in contact with fatty foods for which simulant D1 and/or D2 is laid down.For indirect food contact only, behind a PET layer.
NotesCompliance: V8 Verification of compliance by residual content per food contact surface area (QMA); QMA = 0.005 mg/6 dm2.
Notes: ND The specific migration limit is non-detectable (ND). A detection limit of 0.01mg substance per kg food is applicable unless specified differently for an individual substance.
